articles.title: Above and Beyond Exploring the Amazing World of Aviation

articles.title: Doctors at Aundh District Hospital perform robotic total knee replacement surgery
articles.description: The robotic technology and implants used for the surgery were provided by Meril Company under the Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Jan Arogya Yojana (MJPJAY)
articles.content:
The surgery was performed following the direction and encouragement of Prakash Abitkar, minister of public health; and Dr Nipun Vinayak, secretary, public health department, Government of Maharashtra.

articles.title: Dr Jitendra launches India's first Pilot Trainer Aircraft, reviews 19 seater Aircraft plane
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent BENGALURU, Nov 29: Union Minister of State (Independent Charge) for Science & Technology, Dr. Jitendra Singh today said that India is witnessing an unprecedented transformation in its aerospace and aviation ecosystem, powered by indigenous technologies, industry partnerships, and a whole-of-government approach. Speaking at CSIR-National Aerospace Laboratories (NAL) in Bengaluru, the Minister said that the milestones achieved today reflect Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s vision that “Hawai chappal wala bhi Hawai jahaj mein chalega,” and mark India’s march towards becoming […]
articles.content:
Excelsior Correspondent
BENGALURU, Nov 29: Union Minister of State (Independent Charge) for Science & Technology, Dr. Jitendra Singh today said that India is witnessing an unprecedented transformation in its aerospace and aviation ecosystem, powered ... [3698 chars]

articles.title: Airbus software issue forces grounding of some American Airlines aircraft
articles.description: American Airlines is grounding some Airbus aircraft due to a technology issue that requires a software update. The Fort Worth-based carrier has hundreds of...
articles.content:
American Airlines is temporarily grounding more than 200 of its Airbus A320 family aircraft after Airbus said some models require updates to flight control software.
The Fort Worth carrier, which operates its central hub at D-FW International Airport... [3411 chars]

articles.title: Science Fest promotes innovation and creativity among students in Kapurthala
articles.description: Pushpa Gujral Science City organised Science Fest 2025 to promote innovation and creativity among school students by providing a platform to showcase working models in various fields of Science and Technology.
articles.content:
Pushpa Gujral Science City organised Science Fest 2025 to promote innovation and creativity among school students by providing a platform to showcase working models in various fields of Science and Technology.

articles.title: ASX 200 tech shares fight back after 10 weeks of decline
articles.description: ASX 200 technology shares may have finally found their floor after a dramatic 22.5% tumble for the sector over the past 10 weeks.
articles.content:
ASX 200 tech shares may have finally found their floor after a dramatic 22.5% tumble for the sector over the past 10 weeks.
Technology led the 11 market sectors last week with a 5.96% gain over the five trading days.
The benchmark S&P/ASX 200 Index (... [2076 chars]

articles.title: Supreme Court judge: Tech in judiciary a constitutional need now
articles.description: Bengaluru: Senior judges Saturday stressed that the judiciary must maintain a careful balance between innovation and inclusion, viewing technology as .
articles.content: Bengaluru: Senior judges Saturday stressed that the judiciary must maintain a careful balance between innovation and inclusion, viewing technology as both a powerful enabler of justice and a source of emerging challenges. They emphasised that the goa... [2535 chars]

articles.title: Taiwan’s plan to acquire drone ‘takeover’ technology sparks security debate
articles.description: Network would protect key infrastructure from incursions by small commercial drones but there are concerns over use of takeover function.
articles.content:
The system – separate from the military’s programme – would require equipment capable of electromagnetic jamming and spoofing as well as a takeover function that could seize control of an intruding drone and land it using hacking techniques.
Slides p... [497 chars]

articles.title: China dynamics unsettling global order: Jaishankar
articles.description: Says technology, trade & talent mobility central to today's diplomacy; India’s rise tied to securing global access in these domains.
articles.content: Saying the global order was increasingly becoming less rule-bound and more fragmented, External Affairs Minister Dr S Jaishankar on Saturday said the United States was recasting its terms of engagement, while China was doubling down on operating by i... [2519 chars]

articles.title: Chatbots, tutors and sparring partners: How AI is changing university learning in Singapore
articles.description: Students are experimenting with technology to sharpen skills, get instant feedback and personalise their learning. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE - Imagine having a professor in your pocket, a research assistant working behind the scenes, or a debate partner waiting at your fingertips.
Chatbots and other artificial intelligence (AI) tools are fast becoming part of campus life, guidin... [7940 chars]
